mapper.select:
select v.activityalias_ , v.businessstate_ , t1.id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.acceptance_id , t1.created_by_persion , t1.created_by_dept , t1.form_state , t1.contract_num , t1.buyer_dept , t1.buyer , t1.std_id , t1.charge_person , t1.charge_dept , t1.charge_person_tel , t1.device_name , t1.unify_id , t1.device_type , t1.device_category , t1.device_model , t1.device_spec , t1.manufacturing_number , t1.producing_countries , t1.production_manufacturer , t1.delivery_time , t1.contract_supplier , t1.unit_price , t1.total_price , t1.is_accuracy_check , t1.is_regular_check , t1.is_install , t1.employ_user , t1.employ_dept , t1.measuring_tag , t1.measuring_user , t1.plan_measuring , t1.measuring_time , t1.measuring_period , t1.is_measuring , t1.is_scene_measuring , t1.is_spot_check , t1.is_pc , t1.secret_level , t1.is_safety_production , t1.is_maintain , t1.accuracy_check_result , t1.maintain_result , t1.install_result , t1.quality_result , t1.abarbeitung_result , t1.created_by_tel , t1.fid from assets_stdtemp_acceptance t1 left join bpm_client_hist_procinst_v v on t1.id = v.formid_
and t1.ID =#{bean.id}
and t1.CREATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdBy}),'%')
and t1.CREATION_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.creationDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATED_BY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdatedBy}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateDate}),'%')
and t1.LAST_UPDATE_IP like concat(concat('%',#{bean.lastUpdateIp}),'%')
and t1.VERSION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.version}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_01 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute01}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_02 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute02}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_03 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute03}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_04 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute04}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_05 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute05}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_06 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute06}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_07 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute07}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_08 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute08}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_09 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute09}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_10 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute10}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_11 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute11}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_12 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute12}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_13 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute13}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_14 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute14}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_15 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute15}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_16 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute16}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_17 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute17}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_18 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute18}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_19 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute19}),'%')
and t1.ATTRIBUTE_20 like concat(concat('%',#{bean.attribute20}),'%')
and t1.ACCEPTANCE_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.acceptanceId}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_BY_PERSION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByPersion}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_BY_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByDept}),'%')
and t1.FORM_STATE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.formState}),'%')
and t1.CONTRACT_NUM like concat(concat('%',#{bean.contractNum}),'%')
and t1.BUYER_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.buyerDept}),'%')
and t1.BUYER like concat(concat('%',#{bean.buyer}),'%')
and t1.STD_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.stdId}),'%')
and t1.CHARGE_PERSON like concat(concat('%',#{bean.chargePerson}),'%')
and t1.CHARGE_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.chargeDept}),'%')
and t1.CHARGE_PERSON_TEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.chargePersonTel}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceName}),'%')
and t1.UNIFY_ID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.unifyId}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_TYPE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceType}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_CATEGORY like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceCategory}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_MODEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceModel}),'%')
and t1.DEVICE_SPEC like concat(concat('%',#{bean.deviceSpec}),'%')
and t1.MANUFACTURING_NUMBER like concat(concat('%',#{bean.manufacturingNumber}),'%')
and t1.PRODUCING_COUNTRIES like concat(concat('%',#{bean.producingCountries}),'%')
and t1.PRODUCTION_MANUFACTURER like concat(concat('%',#{bean.productionManufacturer}),'%')
and t1.DELIVERY_TIME >= #{bean.deliveryTimeBegin}
and t1.DELIVERY_TIME <= #{bean.deliveryTimeEnd}
and t1.CONTRACT_SUPPLIER like concat(concat('%',#{bean.contractSupplier}),'%')
and t1.UNIT_PRICE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.unitPrice}),'%')
and t1.TOTAL_PRICE like concat(concat('%',#{bean.totalPrice}),'%')
and t1.IS_ACCURACY_CHECK like concat(concat('%',#{bean.isAccuracyCheck}),'%')
and t1.IS_REGULAR_CHECK like concat(concat('%',#{bean.isRegularCheck}),'%')
and t1.IS_INSTALL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.isInstall}),'%')
and t1.EMPLOY_USER like concat(concat('%',#{bean.employUser}),'%')
and t1.EMPLOY_DEPT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.employDept}),'%')
and t1.MEASURING_TAG like concat(concat('%',#{bean.measuringTag}),'%')
and t1.MEASURING_USER like concat(concat('%',#{bean.measuringUser}),'%')
and t1.PLAN_MEASURING like concat(concat('%',#{bean.planMeasuring}),'%')
and t1.MEASURING_TIME >= #{bean.measuringTimeBegin}
and t1.MEASURING_TIME <= #{bean.measuringTimeEnd}
and t1.MEASURING_PERIOD like concat(concat('%',#{bean.measuringPeriod}),'%')
and t1.IS_MEASURING like concat(concat('%',#{bean.isMeasuring}),'%')
and t1.IS_SCENE_MEASURING like concat(concat('%',#{bean.isSceneMeasuring}),'%')
and t1.IS_SPOT_CHECK like concat(concat('%',#{bean.isSpotCheck}),'%')
and t1.IS_PC like concat(concat('%',#{bean.isPc}),'%')
and t1.SECRET_LEVEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.secretLevel}),'%')
and t1.IS_SAFETY_PRODUCTION like concat(concat('%',#{bean.isSafetyProduction}),'%')
and t1.IS_MAINTAIN like concat(concat('%',#{bean.isMaintain}),'%')
and t1.ACCURACY_CHECK_RESULT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.accuracyCheckResult}),'%')
and t1.MAINTAIN_RESULT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.maintainResult}),'%')
and t1.INSTALL_RESULT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.installResult}),'%')
and t1.QUALITY_RESULT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.qualityResult}),'%')
and t1.ABARBEITUNG_RESULT like concat(concat('%',#{bean.abarbeitungResult}),'%')
and t1.CREATED_BY_TEL like concat(concat('%',#{bean.createdByTel}),'%')
and t1.FID like concat(concat('%',#{bean.fid}),'%')
and exists (select 1 from BPM_CLIENT_HIST_TASK_V os where os.task_b_id_ = t1.id and os.assignee_ = #{bean.currUserId})
and v.businessstate_ = #{bean.bpmState}
order by ${pOrderBy}
order by t1.creation_date desc

select v.activityalias_ , v.businessstate_ , t1.id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.acceptance_id , t1.created_by_persion , t1.created_by_dept , t1.form_state , t1.contract_num , t1.buyer_dept , t1.buyer , t1.std_id , t1.charge_person , t1.charge_dept , t1.charge_person_tel , t1.device_name , t1.unify_id , t1.device_type , t1.device_category , t1.device_model , t1.device_spec , t1.manufacturing_number , t1.producing_countries , t1.production_manufacturer , t1.delivery_time , t1.contract_supplier , t1.unit_price , t1.total_price , t1.is_accuracy_check , t1.is_regular_check , t1.is_install , t1.employ_user , t1.employ_dept , t1.measuring_tag , t1.measuring_user , t1.plan_measuring , t1.measuring_time , t1.measuring_period , t1.is_measuring , t1.is_scene_measuring , t1.is_spot_check , t1.is_pc , t1.secret_level , t1.is_safety_production , t1.is_maintain , t1.accuracy_check_result , t1.maintain_result , t1.install_result , t1.quality_result , t1.abarbeitung_result , t1.created_by_tel , t1.fid from assets_stdtemp_acceptance t1 left join bpm_client_hist_procinst_v v on t1.id = v.formid_

and exists (select 1 from BPM_CLIENT_HIST_TASK_V os where os.task_b_id_ = t1.id and os.assignee_ = #{bean.currUserId})
and v.businessstate_ = #{bean.bpmState}
order by ${pOrderBy}
order by t1.creation_date desc

select t1.id , t1.created_by , t1.creation_date , t1.last_updated_by , t1.last_update_date , t1.last_update_ip , t1.version , t1.attribute_01 , t1.attribute_02 , t1.attribute_03 , t1.attribute_04 , t1.attribute_05 , t1.attribute_06 , t1.attribute_07 , t1.attribute_08 , t1.attribute_09 , t1.attribute_10 , t1.attribute_11 , t1.attribute_12 , t1.attribute_13 , t1.attribute_14 , t1.attribute_15 , t1.attribute_16 , t1.attribute_17 , t1.attribute_18 , t1.attribute_19 , t1.attribute_20 , t1.acceptance_id , t1.created_by_persion , t1.created_by_dept , t1.form_state , t1.contract_num , t1.buyer_dept , t1.buyer , t1.std_id , t1.charge_person , t1.charge_dept , t1.charge_person_tel , t1.device_name , t1.unify_id , t1.device_type , t1.device_category , t1.device_model , t1.device_spec , t1.manufacturing_number , t1.producing_countries , t1.production_manufacturer , t1.delivery_time , t1.contract_supplier , t1.unit_price , t1.total_price , t1.is_accuracy_check , t1.is_regular_check , t1.is_install , t1.employ_user , t1.employ_dept , t1.measuring_tag , t1.measuring_user , t1.plan_measuring , t1.measuring_time , t1.measuring_period , t1.is_measuring , t1.is_scene_measuring , t1.is_spot_check , t1.is_pc , t1.secret_level , t1.is_safety_production , t1.is_maintain , t1.accuracy_check_result , t1.maintain_result , t1.install_result , t1.quality_result , t1.abarbeitung_result , t1.created_by_tel , t1.fid from assets_stdtemp_acceptance t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into assets_stdtemp_acceptance
id,
created_by,
creation_date,
last_updated_by,
last_update_date,
last_update_ip,
version,
attribute_01,
attribute_02,
attribute_03,
attribute_04,
attribute_05,
attribute_06,
attribute_07,
attribute_08,
attribute_09,
attribute_10,
attribute_11,
attribute_12,
attribute_13,
attribute_14,
attribute_15,
attribute_16,
attribute_17,
attribute_18,
attribute_19,
attribute_20,
acceptance_id,
created_by_persion,
created_by_dept,
form_state,
contract_num,
buyer_dept,
buyer,
std_id,
charge_person,
charge_dept,
charge_person_tel,
device_name,
unify_id,
device_type,
device_category,
device_model,
device_spec,
manufacturing_number,
producing_countries,
production_manufacturer,
delivery_time,
contract_supplier,
unit_price,
total_price,
is_accuracy_check,
is_regular_check,
is_install,
employ_user,
employ_dept,
measuring_tag,
measuring_user,
plan_measuring,
measuring_time,
measuring_period,
is_measuring,
is_scene_measuring,
is_spot_check,
is_pc,
secret_level,
is_safety_production,
is_maintain,
accuracy_check_result,
maintain_result,
install_result,
quality_result,
abarbeitung_result,
created_by_tel,
fid,
